bwwExcerpt: They protest too much. “Oh, Mary!” may be silly, campy, even pointless, but “stupid,” I think not. Rather, the play, which opened on Thursday at the Lyceum Theater, is one of the best crafted and most exactingly directed Broadway comedies in years. Which is a surprise on many levels, and on each level a gift.

keyPhrases.quote: one of the best crafted and most exactingly directed Broadway comedies in years
may be silly, campy, even pointless
